attributes.action: Order the renaming of the 'Church' of Scientology under Section 32(1) of the Company Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand the change of name of the so called 'Church' of Scientology, under
Section 32(1) of the Companies Act, because the public could be very easily mislead into believing this company is an official religious organization.  
The "church" of Scientology should simply be "Scientology"
just as "Geology" is not the "church of Geology." Or maybe even Hubbard Association of Personal Independence 
as it is made known in Scotland.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
